H0.text: Which saint was known as “The Apostle of the Indies”. Saint Thomas

H1.text: Which saint was known as “The Apostle of the Indies”. Saint Francis Xavier

H2.text: Which saint was known as “The Apostle of the Indies”. Saint John de Britto

H3.text: Which saint was known as “The Apostle of the Indies”. FXV

A4.text: Known as the 'Apostle of the Indies', he is considered to be one of the greatest missionaries since Paul the Apostle.

A5.text: He led extensive missionary work across Asia, primarily within the Portuguese Empire in the East, and played a significant role in the evangelization of early modern India, particularly through his activities in Portuguese India.
